SCRIPT.MSCRI:
:DEFINE &ARR#, string, 100 :DEFINE &STRING_ARR#, string,100
:IF &$PLATFORM# = "WINDOWS" @echo off :ENDIF
!Normalize and validate paths :INC PCK.AUTOMIC_FILESYSTEM.PUB.INCLUDE.NORMALIZE_PATH "UC4RB_CONVERTED_STRING" = "UC4RB_WEBLOGIC_HOME" :SET &UC4RB_CHECKME# = &UC4RB_WEBLOGIC_HOME# :INC PCK.AUTOMIC_ORACLE_SOA.PRV.INCLUDE.CHECK_DIR_EXISTS
:INC PCK.ITPA_SHARED.PRV.INCLUDE.LOGGING.HEADER.EXECUTION :INC PCK.AUTOMIC_ORACLE_SOA.PRV.INCLUDE.ENSURE_BACKUP_PATHS
:SET &VER# = '' :IF STR_TRIM(&UC4RB_WEBLOGIC_VERSION#)<> '' : SET &VER# = &UC4RB_WEBLOGIC_VERSION# :ENDIF :IF &VER# = '' : SET &VER# = &UC4RB_WEBLOGIC_A_VERSION# :ENDIF
:IF "&UC4RB_IGNORE_VERSION#" <> "False" : SET &VER# = '' :ENDIF
! Attach python script :SET &UC4RB_CONVERTED_STRING# = "BACKUP_REDEPLOY_APPLICATION" :INC PCK.AUTOMIC_ORACLE_SOA.PRV.INCLUDE.ATTACH_PYTHON
! decrypt password :INC PCK.ITPA_SHARED.PUB.INCLUDE.ATTACH :SET &UC4RB_ENCRYPTED_PASSWORD_TMP# = "&UC4RB_WEBLOGIC_PASSWORD#" :INC PCK.ITPA_SHARED.PRV.INCLUDE.DECRYPT_PASSWORD
! prepare general args :INC PCK.AUTOMIC_ORACLE_SOA.PRV.INCLUDE.PREPARE_ARGS
! add custom args depends on your action :SET &UC4RB_WEBLOGIC_CMD# = STR_CAT(&UC4RB_WEBLOGIC_CMD#, ' "&UC4RB_WEBLOGIC_APP_NAME#" "&VER#" "&UC4RB_BACKUP_DIRECTORY#" "&UC4RB_BACKUP_REPORT#" "&UC4RB_USE_CURRENT_APP_VERSION#" ')
! execute python script :INC PCK.AUTOMIC_ORACLE_SOA.PRV.INCLUDE.RUN_WLST
